Get an Estimate Instant Now!

Simple Project Calculator

Calculator is for easily accessible and totally rectangular driveways, patios, or walkways in three popular paver styles only with all colors available for that particular paver style.

Enter total square feet and choose paver style with arrows to get a price.

Estimated price includes demolition, hauling of existing surface, pavers, materials,
installation, a lifetime warranty on pavers, and a 25-year installation warranty.
